# LiveKitRoomProps interface

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface LiveKitRoomProps extends Omit<React.HTMLAttributes<HTMLDivElement>, 'onError'>
```

**Extends:** Omit&lt;React.HTMLAttributes&lt;HTMLDivElement&gt;, 'onError'&gt;

{% partial file="p_usage.md" variables={exampleCount: 0} /%}

## Properties

| Property                                                                  | Type                                      | Description                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   |
| ------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ----------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| [audio?](./react/livekitroomprops.audio.md)                               | AudioCaptureOptions \| boolean            | _(Optional)_ Publish audio immediately after connecting to your LiveKit room.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |
| [connect?](./react/livekitroomprops.connect.md)                           | boolean                                   | _(Optional)_ If set to true a connection to LiveKit room is initiated.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        |
| [connectOptions?](./react/livekitroomprops.connectoptions.md)             | RoomConnectOptions                        | _(Optional)_ Define options how to connect to the LiveKit server.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             |
| [onConnected?](./react/livekitroomprops.onconnected.md)                   | () =&gt; void                             | _(Optional)_                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  |
| [onDisconnected?](./react/livekitroomprops.ondisconnected.md)             | () =&gt; void                             | _(Optional)_                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  |
| [onError?](./react/livekitroomprops.onerror.md)                           | (error: Error) =&gt; void                 | _(Optional)_                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  |
| [onMediaDeviceFailure?](./react/livekitroomprops.onmediadevicefailure.md) | (failure?: MediaDeviceFailure) =&gt; void | _(Optional)_                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  |
| [options?](./react/livekitroomprops.options.md)                           | RoomOptions                               | _(Optional)_ Options for when creating a new room. When you pass your own room instance to this component, these options have no effect. Instead, set the options directly in the room instance.                                                                                                              |
| [room?](./react/livekitroomprops.room.md)                                 | Room                                      | _(Optional)_ Optional room instance. By passing your own room instance you overwrite the <code>options</code> parameter, make sure to set the options directly on the room instance itself.                                                                                                                   |
| [screen?](./react/livekitroomprops.screen.md)                             | ScreenShareCaptureOptions \| boolean      | _(Optional)_ Publish screen share immediately after connecting to your LiveKit room.                                                                                                                                                                                                                          |
| [serverUrl](./react/livekitroomprops.serverurl.md)                        | string \| undefined                       | URL to the LiveKit server. For example: <code>wss://&lt;domain&gt;.livekit.cloud</code> To simplify the implementation, <code>undefined</code> is also accepted as an intermediate value, but only with a valid string url can the connection be established.                                                 |
| [simulateParticipants?](./react/livekitroomprops.simulateparticipants.md) | number \| undefined                       | _(Optional)_                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  |
| [token](./react/livekitroomprops.token.md)                                | string \| undefined                       | A user specific access token for a client to authenticate to the room. This token is necessary to establish a connection to the room. To simplify the implementation, <code>undefined</code> is also accepted as an intermediate value, but only with a valid string token can the connection be established. |
| [video?](./react/livekitroomprops.video.md)                               | VideoCaptureOptions \| boolean            | _(Optional)_ Publish video immediately after connecting to your LiveKit room.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |
